𓄟meso
𓏶 𓅓 𓏏
𓏇 𓏏 𓏮 𓏜 mitte ⲙⲏϯ! 𓏇 ⋍ 𓄡 mațe matsã 𓅓 𓄡 𓏏 𓅱 𓄼 (guts@Aromanian) vs

𒈦 MAŠ < MAD mid in 𒈦 medi mišlu "half" 𒈦 MAŠ mesh < MAD in 𐎎𐎄𐎍 madl 𒈦𒈝 mašlum basket

ⲘⲎⲎⲢⲈ, ⲘⲈⲈⲢⲈ, ⲘⲈⲢⲈ (mtr) - midday

𒄷𒄭𒋫𒌅 mut-ta-tu mitte “middle, half”

𒇷𒈪𒌅 li-mi-tu limit “enclosure” 𓇥 𓂋

𒌙 ma.utu mouth / middle moon 𒌗 / month 𒌘

mənt => met meat mit mutual mid
𒊑𒈬𒌅 ri-mu-tu “gift” •remūta remittance … 𐌼𐌰𐌹𐌸𐌼𐍃 maiþms mathom mūtare (“to change, exchange, barter”) ⇔ remorsel
𒊑𒈬𒌅 ri-mu-tu 𐎎𐎉𐎃 mṭḫ מַתָּנָה mataná 𐌼𐌰𐌹𐌸𐌼𐍃 “gift” gift, present
